title: Innovation platforms for improved livelihoods and rainwater management in Ethiopia

tasks.task: Set up innovation platforms for natural resource management and livelihood improvement.
subtasks: Send official letters to stakeholders to establish innovation platforms.
Brief innovation platform members on objectives and roles.
Identify and prioritize issues through engagement activities like focus groups and participatory video.
Plan joint actions for forage intervention entry points tailored to each site's needs.
Organize technical groups for ongoing follow-up between meetings.
Conduct awareness creation and field demonstrations with small farmers.

tasks.task: Overcome challenges in behavioral change and limited time during the Nile Basin Development Challenge.
subtasks: Address short project timeline by focusing on sustainable impact methodologies.
Provide training on facilitation skills and participatory research methods.
Assist local partners in managing innovation platform meetings and scaling successful models.
